ValidationRule.description: only allow stage updation from 'Rejected' to 'Submitted' and 'Archive'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Not yet commenced") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "In progress") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Final") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Recall") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Approval In Progress") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Approved") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: stage can be manually updated from 'Rejected' to only 'Submitted' or 'Archive'
